title: Bush on the 1990 Gulf War - comparison

content.prompt: Which of the following most directly represents an attempt to put the principles stated in the excerpt into action?

choices.label: Curtailing domestic civil liberties through federal legislation to improve security against terrorism
Participating in peacekeeping interventions in the Balkans to stop ethnic cleansing
Constructing the Star Wars missile defense system to reduce the nuclear threat

topic.text: 9.3: The End of the Cold War

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
